name: EDT Workshop
body:
# Background The aim of YRS x EDT Workshops is to introduce young people to the foundations of digital making and technology in an enjoyable and immersive way. Our workshops are inspirational, fun and hands-on, with a focus on peer-to-peer learning and teamwork. Each workshop follows a simple, three module process that introduces the basics before quickly allowing participants to explore the practical application of their new skills. The YRS x EDT Introduction to Web Development Workshop provides the fundamental development and design skills required to build for the web.
